label: 神祇官
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: In charge of the worship of the Deities of Heaven (Amatsu-kami) and Earth (Kunitsu-kami ); supervised the national Shintō shrines (kampeisha ), provincial Shintō shrines (kokuheisha ), and the lesser Shintō shrines; kept lists of the Shintō Shrine Officials (Hafuri-be ), Deity Hereditary Corporations (Kam-be ), etc.; in charge of Shintō festivals and ceremonies, etc. [天津神、国津神、官幣社、国幣社、神道、祝部、神部]
